actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to the purchase of cotton by the bank of Tokyo.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Congress that the Export - Import Bank of the United States should not provide financing to the Bank of Tokyo, Limited, for certain purchases of raw cotton.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to the purchase of cotton by the bank of Tokyo.
